name: \#\i[165]\#\v[317]
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.
(Siffrin's attack)
<Critical Multiplier: 10%>
<whole action>
immortal: targets, false
add state 54: user
wait: 20

action animation: target
wait for animation
wait for animation

if (target.hp / target.mhp <= 0)
add state 1: target
else
add state 53: target

wait for animation
action effect: target
</whole action>

<target action>
</target action>

<follow action>
remove state 54: user
clear battle log
wait: 30
remove state 53: targets
common event: 210
</follow action>
<Japanese Translation>
[message2]:攻撃する\v[286]
</Japanese Translation>

name: ---[Enemies]---
note:
<Japanese Translation>
[message2]:ボニーが飛び出す！
</Japanese Translation>

name: [Scissors]
note:
action motion: 7
<action copy: skill:132>
<Japanese Translation>
[message1]:の攻撃！
</Japanese Translation>

name: [Scissors (All)]
note:
<action copy: skill:133>
<Japanese Translation>
[message1]:が暴れまわる！
</Japanese Translation>
<Custom Target Eval>
// Adds the selected target to the target list.
targets.push(target);
// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
// Remove the target from the group of candidates.
members.splice(members.indexOf(target), 1);
// This is the number of extra targets to select with Chain Lightning.
var extraTargets = 2;
// Loop the extra targets.
while (extraTargets--) {
  // Grab a random foe from the alive foes.
  var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
  // Check to see if the member exists.
  if (member) {
    // Add the member to the group of targets.
    targets.push(member);
    // Remove the member as a viable candidate.
    members.splice(members.indexOf(member), 1);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>

note:
action motion: 7

// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
// Remove the target from the group of candidates.
members.splice(members.indexOf(target), 1);
// This is the number of extra targets to select with Chain Lightning.
var extraTargets = 2;
// Loop the extra targets.
while (extraTargets--) {
  // Grab a random foe from the alive foes.
  var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
  // Check to see if the member exists.
  if (member) {
    // Add the member to the group of targets.
    targets.push(member);
    // Remove the member as a viable candidate.
    members.splice(members.indexOf(member), 1);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>

name: [Normal Attack (All)]
note:
<action copy: skill:133>
<Japanese Translation>
[message1]:が暴れまわる！
</Japanese Translation>
<Custom Target Eval>
// Adds the selected target to the target list.
targets.push(target);
// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
// Remove the target from the group of candidates.
members.splice(members.indexOf(target), 1);
// This is the number of extra targets to select with Chain Lightning.
var extraTargets = 2;
// Loop the extra targets.
while (extraTargets--) {
  // Grab a random foe from the alive foes.
  var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
  // Check to see if the member exists.
  if (member) {
    // Add the member to the group of targets.
    targets.push(member);
    // Remove the member as a viable candidate.
    members.splice(members.indexOf(member), 1);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>
